HERO.TITLE: With more than four decades of experience in delivering ERP systems tailored to different industries, Al-Motammem is one of the pioneers in providing ERP systems and software solutions in Egypt, the Middle East, North Africa, and the GCC region since 1986. Our systems are built on smart, advanced technologies designed specifically based on analyzing each client's needs and business rules to match the nature of their operations. Al-Motammem is available in multiple packages and a wide range of solutions crafted to meet diverse business requirements across various sectors, from inventory management to sales, customer relations, HR, and more. Whatever your organization’s needs are, Al-Motammem is here to simplify your operations and keep you ahead of the competition.

HERO.TITLE: All your business cycles in one place, even across multiple companies and different operations
HERO.DETAILS: From finance, inventory, sales, and purchasing to HR — discover how Al-Motammem brings all operations together under a single system, whether for one company or multiple companies, with consolidated reporting across companies and other levels.

FINANCE.TITLE: Finance & Accounting
FINANCE.DESC: General ledger, accounts, fixed assets and depreciation, cost centers, financial reports.

INVENTORY.TITLE: Inventory
INVENTORY.DESC: Inventory control, stock valuation, balance tracking, stocktaking, and revaluation of inventory.

PURCHASING.TITLE: Purchasing and Supplier Accounts with payables tracking
PURCHASING.DESC: Full purchasing cycle from purchase requisitions, supplier quotations and evaluation, to purchase orders, receipts, invoices and returns, and purchasing analysis.

SALES.TITLE: Sales and Customer Accounts with receivables tracking
SALES.DESC: Full sales cycle from quotation requests and price offers, to sales orders, invoicing, delivery and returns, statements of account and aging of receivables, and sales analysis.

HR.TITLE: HR & Payroll
HR.DESC: Employee management, payroll, attendance and time tracking, performance, HR records, recruitment, appraisal, and employee self-services.

PROJECTS.TITLE: Projects & Control
PROJECTS.DESC: Resource planning, project costing, and execution tracking.

REPORTS.TITLE: Reports & Dashboards
REPORTS.DESC: Real-time insights, performance indicators, and custom analytics.

MANUFACTURING.TITLE: Manufacturing
MANUFACTURING.DESC: Track items and their movements, including raw materials, semi-finished goods and finished products, with full costing for each item. All movements are linked to sales, purchases and both production and service cost centers, with alerts when predefined thresholds or conditions are reached or about to be reached.

CONTRACTING.TITLE: Contracting
CONTRACTING.DESC: Monitor supplier and subcontractor accounts, and calculate the costs and revenues of each project and every work item in real time, fully linked to trial balances, income statements and balance sheets.

NON_PROFIT.TITLE: Non-profit Organizations
NON_PROFIT.DESC: Track funding sources and related spending, link them to the planned budget, and receive alerts when predefined limits or conditions are about to be or have been exceeded.

IMPORT_EXPORT.TITLE: Import & Export
IMPORT_EXPORT.DESC: Follow up import operations and calculate the exact cost of each shipment and every item within it, linking this to inventory and accounts until the item reaches the warehouse, enabling accurate real-time cost of sales and profitability calculations.

DISTRIBUTION.TITLE: Distribution
DISTRIBUTION.DESC: Monitor the sales plan at company, region and sales-rep levels and beyond, follow up sales representatives and their commissions, and generate detailed analytics on sales and profitability by rep, region, governorate, city, route and item, and many other analysis dimensions.

MULTINATIONAL.TITLE: Multinational Companies
MULTINATIONAL.DESC: Accurate management of financial data with advanced reports and analytics, and the ability to generate all financial reports in real time in operating currencies, local currency and the parent company’s currency.

FOOD_BEVERAGE.TITLE: Food & Beverage
FOOD_BEVERAGE.DESC: Accurately track items and their expiry dates, and monitor production batches for each item, whether on purchase, sale or remaining stock.

SERVICES.TITLE: Services
SERVICES.DESC: Manage contracts, monitor team performance and issue invoices with ease and accuracy.

TRADING_PROJECTS.TITLE: Trading, Import/Export & Projects
TRADING_PROJECTS.DESC: Plan resources, control costs and schedule tasks for each project, with direct linkage to financial and operational results.

FINANCE_ACCOUNTING.TITLE: Finance & Accounting
FINANCE_ACCOUNTING.DESC: Accurate management of financial data with advanced reports and analytics, real-time financial reporting, and alerts when predefined thresholds or conditions are about to be or have been reached.

SECTION4.TITLE: The integration that makes all your company’s departments work in harmony and accuracy
SECTION4.DETAILES: Al-Motammem does not only connect workflows—it creates a unified environment that brings together all your departments, from finance and sales to HR, projects, and more, all operating on the same system.

ITEM1.TITLE: Internal Integration
ITEM1.TEXT: Any update made in one department is instantly reflected across all others, allowing you to verify data accuracy before it impacts the system.

ITEM2.TITLE: Cross-Sector Integration
ITEM2.TEXT: Even companies with diverse operations (manufacturing, sales, services) can run smoothly on the same unified platform.

ITEM3.TITLE: External Integrations (APIs)
ITEM3.TEXT: Connect your external systems with your current tools — payment gateways, banking systems, team tools (Google Meet, Excel), and tax platforms (ETA & ZATCA).

ITEM4.TITLE: Unified Dashboard
ITEM4.TEXT: Gives you a complete and real-time overview of performance across all departments, sectors, and companies in one place.
